SEARCH
Package ca.mcgill.splendorserver.model.cards

Class Card

java.lang.Object
ca.mcgill.splendorserver.model.cards.Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Card>
Direct Known Subclasses:
OrientCard
public class Card extends Object implements Comparable<Card>
Represents a Splendor Card with id, prestige, tokenBonus, deckType, discount and cost This class implements the Flyweight design pattern.

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(int id, int prestige, TokenType tokenBonusType, DeckType deckType, TokenBonusAmount tokenBonusAmount, CardCost cardCost)
      Creates a card.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the card
      prestige - The prestige earned upon purchasing the card
      tokenBonusType - The bonus received upon purchasing the card
      deckType - The type of card
      tokenBonusAmount - The amount of bonus gems a card is worth
      cardCost - The cost of the card

      public void setBonusAmount(TokenBonusAmount tokenBonusAmount)
      Sets the token bonus amount to the given amount. Only used when a spice bag card is paired with a card in the user inventory.
      Parameters:
      tokenBonusAmount - the amount to be set

    • setBonusType
